Description

Marshall JVM 205C 

Hi team,
Far too old to get the most out of this now.

This amplifier is absolutely fantastic.
The tone of this amp will give you shimmering cleans to all out blistering marshall saturation and over drive the Marshall amps are known for, all controlled via the included footswitch.
These specs from the manufacturers website:
Model: JVM205C
Range: JVM
Technology: Valve
Channels: 2 (Multi)
ELECTRONICS
Output wattage: 50W
Outputs: Speaker outputs: 5 x 1/4" jack sockets (16Ω load / 8Ω load / 4Ω load), Emulated Line Out (XLR), MIDI Thru
Inputs: 1 x 1/4" jack instrument input, MIDI In, Footswitch
Controls: Channel and mode select (button), gain (per channel), treble (per channel), middle (per channel), bass (per channel), reverb (per channel), presence, resonance, master volume select, master volume (switchable for each channnel)
Effects: Digital reverb
Effects loop: 2, 1 x series parallel, 1 x series
SPEAKERS
Speaker configuration: 2x12"
Speaker model: 1 x Celestion Heritage G12H (8Ω, 80w), 1 x Celestion Vintage (8Ω, 70w)
Unit impedance: 16Ω
VALVES
Preamp valves: 4 x ECC83, 1 x ECC83 (phase splitter)
Power amp valves: 2 x EL34
ACCESSORIES
Footswitch: PEDL-91006 included
Cable: Detachable power cable included
Dust cover: M-COVR-00073 (sold separately)(not included)
DIMENSIONS (INCLUDING FEET AND HANDLE)
Weight: 29.5 kg / 65 lbs
Width: 690 mm / 27.2"
Height: 510 mm / 20.1"
Depth: 265 mm / 10.4"

The amp has been used for seldom light use at home as well as being a piece of home decor as it looks “a million bucks”
It is completely fine playing at bedroom volume - I have used it for this for years.

Will consider trades for a smaller fender tube amplifier or something similar
Feel free to make contact with me, I am not an amplifier expert but I will try to accommodate genuine inquiries to the best of my ability 

Happy to work with interested parties to make sure this gets to you safe and sound 

Thanks 
Mike
